#summary Spell-checker and thesaurus

== Introduction ==

Spell-checker and thesaurus based on [http://nhunspell.sourceforge.net NHunspell]. The core [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hunspell Hunspell] is
used in `OpenOffice` and it works with dictionaries published on `OpenOffice.org`.

----

Distributed as the NuGet package [https://www.nuget.org/packages/FarNet.RightWords FarNet.RightWords]
 * [https://farnet.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Install-FarNet.en.txt HOW TO DOWNLOAD AND INSTALL]
 * [https://farnet.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Install-FarNet.ru.txt КАК ЗАГРУЗИТЬ И УСТАНОВИТЬ]
